review: *** ** *** **** ************* ** *** ***** Highly recommended. A thorough professional. Dr. Sita doesn't recommend unnecessary tests and also doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines. Extremely polite and approachable at all times. Rest assured that you are in safe hands under her treatment and care.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Sita was very kind and helpful. Very patient and well understanding to my problem . I was in acute pain but within no time I felt the difference and now I feel much better than before . She discussed my entire history with so much patience as my case was a little bit complicated . I sincerely thank her for the same .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my wife to Dr Sita when she was pregnant and baby delivered on 29 Sep, it was CSection due to the weight of the baby and it was the right decision. Dr Sita highly recommended she does regular screening on each visit. She explains with full of patience and you may ask question she will answer with charm.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is just amazing. She made sure i had normal delivery although it took ages to get to the final stage. She gave personal attention to me when i had almost given up. She is a straight forward doctor. ******* ********* *** *********** ********* ** ********** You will get all the required information. She also gave pre and post pregnancy counselling which prepared both me and my husband for what's coming. I wouldn't go to anyone else. Go for her!

review: Dr Sita is an experienced doctor with a golden heart who always keeps the patient's emotional and physical health at the centre while giving the best treatment:1) Always try for most natural process and normal delivery2) Each appointment she prepares you well with what steps to be taken next and never overburdens with information. 3) Always empower the patient with just right information and encourages patient to read more on the internet 4) Available over phone for urgent mattersHer commitment and care to give best care is exemplary !! tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Sita Gururaja for gynaec related issues. It has been a very nice experience to speak to someone who could relate to my issues and understand my state of mind . She is extremely helpful making you understand the importance of how you should be taking precautions and advising you to do something that's more beneficial for your health overall. Advised necessary tests to be done. Thank you Dr. Sita Gururaja. I would love to recommend my family & friends too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sita Gururaja is simply Fabulous... she is very straight forward... *** **** *** ******* *** **** *** *********** ************* she is very positive about her work... As I have an average height..people used to doubt about my vaginal delivery.. But she was the one who always believed in my normal delivery... Very Happy to Visit her... She understands your queries very calmly then starts with her treatment..thank you for your support and satisfactory treatment..Keep up the good work Dr.
